titles.title: 238 The Pearl Of Greatest Price (familiar tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found the Pearl of greatest price
My heart doth sing for joy
And sing I must
For Christ I have
Oh what a Christ have I

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Christ is my Prophet Priest and King
My Prophet full of light
My Priest that stands
'twixt God and man
My King
that rules with might

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My Christ he is the Lord of lords
He is the King of kings
He is
the Sun of Righteousness
With healing in His wings

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My Christ he is
The Tree of Life
Who in God's garden grows
Whose fruit doth feed
Whose leaves do heal
My Christ is Sharon's Rose

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Christ is my meat
Christ is my drink
My medicine and my health
My peace my strength
My joy my crown
My glory and my wealth

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Christ is my Father and my Friend
My Brother and my Love
My Head - my Hope my Counsellor
My Advocate above

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
My Christ He is
the Heaven of heavens
My Christ what shall I call
My Christ is First
My Christ is Last
My Christ is All in all
